description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Here is your chance to go to a super elite business school and earn an MBA.  However, Future Robber Baron’s University is like no other business school.  It is not about lectures and exams.  There is only one test and only one thing that counts - can you make money?  How much?  1 Billion dollars in four years or you flunk out.
description.short: Here is your chance to go to a super elite business school and earn an MBA.  However, Future Robber Baron’s University is like no other business school.  It is not about lectures and exams.  There is only one test and only one thing that counts - can you make money?  How much?  1 Billion dollars in four years or you flunk out.
